subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kirk Gibson has faced scrutiny for some of his decisions that have left the Diamondbacks in a 2-0 hole against the Brewers in a best-of-five National League division series.
snippet: Kirk Gibson has faced scrutiny for some of his decisions that have left the Diamondbacks in a 2-0 hole against the Brewers in a best-of-five National League division series.
